Content.Text:
<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Got'cha!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! Check this out! I caught one!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know, why don't you help me catch some
insects, <MYNAME>?
Hey, you two!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great to see ya! What'cha doing?

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, Tina. Take a look! We're catching
insects. You want to help us out, Tina?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry, I can't right now. I've got 
something I need to do.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Something important? Like what?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, that's the thing... I've been
putting on a little weight recently and
so, I want to start a diet.
<PAGE>
So I thought I might jog around here a
little.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
What, that's it? If it was fun then I
thought I might tag along. But jogging?
Boring!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Boring? You're talking about something
that's really important to a young 
woman, okay?
<PAGE>
I've always quickly put on weight if I
drop my guard for just one meal. Being
beautiful is a full time job!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't really understand anything
you're saying. But yeah, you have put on
some weight!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
H-Hey! Keep that to yourself, okay?

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? You just said that yourself! I'm
just telling it like it is.
<PAGE>
I've seen you stuffing your face with
snacks. Drop your guard for one meal?
I'm surprised you're not house sized!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your face is definitely much fatter than
before and your stomach looks much
plumper too.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You must have known for a while now
that you've been getting fatter, right?
So why did you leave it so long?

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Why aren't you saying anything?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You've been saying enough for the both
of us!
<PAGE>
There are some things that even kids
aren't allowed to say!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
W-What are you talking about? I've been
taught to always tell the truth.
<PAGE>
Blaming other people must be what made
you fat!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? That's the final straw! You're
going to pay for that!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wah! Run!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wait! Punishment time!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
S-Stop it! No violence! No violence!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Enough! You'll apologize or else!
